function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open collaboration between research institutions and public authorities may lead to unfiltered or unverified data being used in decision-making processes.","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading data may result in inappropriate policy decisions, leading to ineffective disease control measures.","Mitigation":"Implement data verification and validation processes to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data being used for decision-making.","Technologies":"Data validation tools, machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection, and data quality management systems.","People":"Public authorities, policymakers, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions and data curation teams."},{"Description":"Lack of division of agreed goals between research institutions and public authorities may lead to conflicting priorities and objectives in the development of public monitoring programmes.","Impact":"Conflicting priorities may hinder the effectiveness of public monitoring programmes and government actions in response to critical crises like the COVID-19 pandemic.","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels and regular meetings to align priorities and objectives between research institutions and public authorities.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, project management software, and communication tools.","People":"Research institution personnel, public authorities, and policy development officers.","Owner":"Joint responsibility of research institutions and public authorities."},{"Description":"Proactive agile development of the COVID-19 dashboard without proper planning may result in incomplete or inaccurate data representation.","Impact":"Incomplete or inaccurate data representation may lead to misinformed critical crisis response and urban governance decisions.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough planning and requirements analysis to ensure the completeness and accuracy of the data representation in the dashboard.","Technologies":"Agile project management tools, data visualization software, and user feedback systems.","People":"Project development teams, data analysts, and urban governance stakeholders.","Owner":"Project development teams and urban governance stakeholders."}]}
